alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Iberia and northwestern St. Mary Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glencoe, or near Jeanerette, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jeanerette, Cote Blanche Island and Glencoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia
